title: Restaurant
description: Excellent Polish cuisine is an asset of Jab≈Çonkowy Las.
text: We serve classic Polish dishes prepared on site from fresh, local products.
breakfast1_2: Breakfast is a buffet that consists of a hot dish (e.g. omelette, pancakes or scrambled eggs). Everyday is something different. On top of that, we serve cheeses, meats and vegetables to the table. On some days, the cold cuts are replaced by smoked fish. Country bread, jam and honey, cereals, milk, juice, coffee, tea are also available.
lunch1_2: During the day, we invite you for lunch, which consists of three dishes served to the table. We start with the soup, then the main course, and finally the dessert. We always try to choose dishes so that they are not only tasty, but also suitable for the Warmian countryside.
lunch1_3: The restaurant also serves fast food such as fries and burgers.
extra1_1: Throughout the day you can also buy alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at the bar.
extra1_2: We cordially invite you to try delicious cocktails, such as Aperol Spritz, which perfectly refreshes on hot summer days, or the classic Mojito.
